Optional, the default locale used to determine language-specific behavior of the prompt. The locale is a 2, 3, or 4 character ISO 639 code that represents a language or language family.

Docs.remarks:
The value of must be unique within the or to which the prompt is added.
If the of the .. is specified, then that local is used to determine language specific behavior; otherwise the is used. US-English is the used if no language or default locale is available, or if the language or locale is not otherwise supported.
